divs: sighting detailsi found this extraordinary video entitled "ufo mile long" and dated january 13, 2008 at http:\\www.metacafe.com\w\1187634\. it was submitted by ig4you on march 25, 2008. although no location is given, i suspect it was filmed in texas, because the images fit the descriptions of all the sightings in and and around stephenville,tx around the same dates in january 2008. perhaps, mufon and\or your collaborators at ufo hunters could investigate further. good luck!
Summary: Huge black rectangular craft, 2 luminous blobs and a rigid sphere
